attributes.action: Remove Boris Johnson and anyone else fined over COVID rule breaches from office.
attributes.additional_details: This is a national and international embarassment and as he has indicated he will not resign, he must be removed from his post, as should any other minister fined over COVID rule breaches.
attributes.background: The Prime Minister of the UK has been proven to have lied to the British public about his conduct again. This is a national and international embarrassment and as he has indicated he will not resign, he must be removed from his post, as should any other minister fined over COVID rule breaches.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
